item.title: Scorpion stings woman at Boston baggage claim after flight from Mexico
item.description: A passenger at Boston Logan was stung by a scorpion yesterday while retrieving her luggage in the baggage claim area of customs, according to police.

item.title: Demi Moore congratulates Mikey Madison on best actress Oscar
